ygData.subject: Re: Megatron must not live
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron and his men entered the Ice Caves, Megatrons lair before joining with Aracnia. THis would be good enough for now considering the circumstances. As for

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Megatron and his men entered the Ice Caves, Megatrons lair before 
joining with Aracnia. THis would be good enough for now considering the 
circumstances. As for the injured Quickstrike, he was going right into the CR 
pool.
       "Bring the scans on line, and I want the entrance sealed and autoguns 
armed. " Megatron ordered, taking his command chair as Waspinator, Aquarous, 
Paddletail, and Nighteyes took thier stations. Adrax showed Quickstrike to 
the Cr pool.
       "We shouldnt have run, Megatron. We could have put up an excellent 
fight and probly would have done alot of unfixable damage before we 
retreated. " Hell Beast scorned from across the room at a 3D map of the 
surround artic territory. He watched as Apocolypse and several other of the 
Rebels men search for them. If they did come here, they were sure to meet and 
icy grave because this artic was Megatrons turff. The turff of the true 
Predacons.
       "Nonsense Hell Beast. How did you expect to win if we couldnt do any 
damage to them because it was considered moding? Silly ol' Hell Beast. Now, 
lets get serious. Were going to go through as planned.....well, not exactly." 
Megatron went on as he walked over to the map, and brought up a visual of the 
Cybertronian Fire.
       "Our next conquest? The Maximals? What a waste of time!" Aracnia 
screamed from the CR pool, still watching Quickstrike. She, also, kept Quasar 
close to her.
       Megatron shook his head. "No, if we were to get rid of that ship, or 
use it to our advantage, we could destroy the Maximals and thus end one thorn 
in our side." He looked at the blue prints of the ship. It seemed under its 
new management it had been dilapidated a bit.....or was he getting confused 
with the Ark? Well, whatever it was the Maximals were weak and could be 
exploited.
       "Yes, well, do what you will. Gremlin, come with me. We are out for 
awhile." Hell Beast said as he walked closer to the entrance. "Things have 
changed Megatron, in such a short time. We went from superpower to under-dogs 
over night. I have to think and clear my head."
       The two Predacons exited into the relentless snowstorm that seemed 
constant in the high mountian they inhabited. Now Megatron turned to the 
troops. They were angry, no doubt about that. "Aracnia, may I send out our 
ambassador? I believe we can still clean up this mess."
       Aracnia looked up, "Hell Beast is gone." She seemed to be extreamly 
distraught. "Who are you talking about?"
       "Well, Quasar and Tarantulas are still here. Besides, she could really 
learn a few things from the meeting. What do you say, Quasar? Will you go?"

--part1_31.d85d82e.275eb224_boundary
